content.question: Which of the following best describes the function of the first sentence (“A country...a problem”)?

choices.label: It makes a claim that the passage goes on to defend.
It introduces evidence that the passage goes on to analyze.
It summarizes a conclusion that the author attributes to others.
It contradicts an argument that the author believes to be erroneous.

content.answer: It makes a claim that the passage goes on to defend.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
